purpose: To provide a curated list of resources and research papers focused on the application of reinforcement learning in cybersecurity
principle: Aggregates and categorizes various academic papers, tools, and projects related to reinforcement learning applications in cybersecurity
reusability: Can be used as a reference guide for researchers and practitioners interested in reinforcement learning for cybersecurity applications
limitations: Primarily a static resource list; does not include interactive or executable components
name: awesome-rl-for-cybersecurity
description: A curated list of resources dedicated to reinforcement learning applied to cyber security.
highlight: Comprehensive resource list for applying reinforcement learning in cybersecurity
